about_the_game:
Grab the Battle Pass to unlock 20 extra rewards! Enjoy new character skins, Coins, Souls Coins, experience and more!

Here's the full list of contents for the Battle Pass:


  • 2 Champions Skins
  • 90 Souls Coins
  • 5 Big Bags with Gold and XP
  • 3 Small Bags with Gold and XP
  • 500 Gold Coins
detailed_description:
Grab the Battle Pass to unlock 20 extra rewards! Enjoy new character skins, Coins, Souls Coins, experience and more!

Here's the full list of contents for the Battle Pass:


  • 2 Champions Skins
  • 90 Souls Coins
  • 5 Big Bags with Gold and XP
  • 3 Small Bags with Gold and XP
  • 500 Gold Coins

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 64 bits
  • Processor: x64-compatible 1.4GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 level Graphics Card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 64 bits
  • Processor: x64-compatible, quad core, 3.2GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or ATI Radeon™ RX560 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Battle Pass - Drainlive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 32 bits
  • Processor: x86-compatible 1.2GHz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 level Graphics Card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 64 bits
  • Processor: x64-compatible, quad core, 2.2GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 970 or ATI Radeon™ RX560 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Grab the Battle Pass to unlock 20 extra rewards! Enjoy new character skins, Coins, Souls Coins, experience and more!
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Russian
